price: E os que, depois disso, forjam mentiras acerca de Allah, esses são os injustos.
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: famani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba min baʿdi dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ẓālimūna
